mapper.select: select tb_repairlog.id, tb_user.username as userUsername, tb_user.name as userName, tb_property.pname as propertyName, tb_repairlog.number, tb_property.spec as propertySpec, tb_repairlog.status, tb_repairlog.time, tb_repairlog.remark from tb_repairlog left join tb_user on tb_repairlog.user_id = tb_user.uid left join tb_property on tb_repairlog.property_id = tb_property.pid ${ew.customSqlSegment}
